titleStmt.title: Icones & descriptiones rariorum plantarum Siciliæ, Melitæ, Galliæ, & Italiæ quarum unaquæque proprio charactere signata, ab aliis ejusdem classis facile distinguitur / auctore Paulo Boccone ...
titleStmt.author: Boccone, Paolo, 1633-1704.
Morison, Robert, 1620-1683.

notesStmt.note: Edited, with a dedication, by Robertus Morison. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
